mapper.select: SELECT b.blog_id, u.userName, b.hashTag, b.createdAt, bf.fileName FROM blog b inner join blog_file bf on b.blog_id = bf.blogId inner join users u on b.userSeq = u.userSeq limit 9 offset #{offset};
mapper.insert: insert into blog ( userSeq, planId, tripPlanSpotId, content, hashTag, createdAt) values ( #{userSeq}, #{planId}, #{tripPlanSpotId}, #{content}, #{hashTag}, now())
insert into blog_file ( fileName, blogId ) values ( #{fileName}, #{blogId})
